item.title: Ditch right across road, 13th January
item.description:
This was part of road which was dug up last year to put in new pipe but the trench was never properly finished off and it is opening up again - looking at previous reports it looks as though it has been closed but certainly hasnt been fixed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple large pot holes, 13th January
item.description:
Multiple large pot holes have opened up again over an area that was already repaired going uphill on the dual carriageway towards Northleach. Completely impossible to avoid and very dangerous going round corner at high speeds when trying to swerve round them. Please repair with something more permanent. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many potholes - photos attached., 13th January
item.description:
Unfortunately it’s not possible to attach photos of all the potholes. The surface is all broken up now and an accident/damage waiting to happen. Please please can some warning signage be provided, and a plan communicated regarding resurfacing of this street which is a through road. Suggest an advisory speed limit should also be posted with loose gravel warning signs. Potholes outside: 5 17 25 31 35 38 41 45 Whittington Road. Benhall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor road surface, 13th January
item.description:
The entirety of the road on Victoria Place is in a sorry state. It probably needs resurfacing as it is extremely dangerous in its current state. I see this issue has been reported before, however, it hasn't yet been addressed and the situation is worsening throughout the winter. Throughout the last couple of months I have seen at least two people burst their bike tyres on the surface. Fortunately nobody was hurt. Please address this. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Victoria Place, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The entire street beyond terrible state of the road, 13th January
item.description:
Almost the entire street, but particularly between number 45 - 53 Keynsham Street, have terrible terrible road situation which is constantly causing huge damage to cars and I am concerned about a sink hole too. The damage has been caused in large part by Severn Trent digging up the street so many times to fix water issues and never making the street smooth again. It is shockingly bad.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Keynsham Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstructed Streetlight, 13th January
item.description:
There are 2 streetlights on our road obstructed by overgrown greenery. One is completely obstructed by a tree with no light reaching the pavement and the other is semi-obstructed by ivy but soon to be entirely obstructed. As you can imagine, the lack of lighting is a concern to nearby residents, and a waste of energy when they are on every night but with no purpose. The streetlights are too obscured to read the column numbers. However, the What3Words location of these 2 streetlights are: - lend.limes.tribe - brave.hurls.pull Please find attached a photo of one of the streetlights.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Radnor Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous tree, 13th January
item.description:
I’m writing to report a dangerous tree on public land that’s at risk of falling, especially during high winds. The tree is located at Windyridge Gardens, Cheltenham behind house 117. What three words location ( spare.bonds.timing ) I’m concerned because during recent high winds, the tree was visibly moving more than usual. Given the risk to public safety and nearby property, I’d like this inspected urgently and appropriate action taken. Please confirm receipt of this report and let me know what steps will be taken. I’m happy to provide photographs or further details if needed. Thank you for your attention to this matter. Kind regards, Martin Griffiths 07837910976

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 117, Windyridge Gardens, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Kingsclere Drive, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Multiple potholes on Woodlands Road, 13th January
item.description:
There are multiple potholes on Woodlands Road, it appears to be getting worse daily and is now causing issues with cars trying to avoid the potholes and mess caused by them. A lot of children cross this road and I am concerned there will be an accident. This has become a far more apparent issue since the buses started using the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Woodlands Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
